snippet: D. Wayne Lukas, the 76-year old Hall of Fame trainer, has not had a winner in his last 109 graded stakes races, but he still has Kentucky Derby hopes.
abstract: Hall of Fame horse trainer D Wayne Lucas has not saddled a winner in 109 graded stakes races, but the losses do not discourage Lukas, who is hoping that Optimizer can earn his way into the Kentucky Derby with an Arkansas Derby victory.
lead_paragraph: D. Wayne Lukas, the 76-year old Hall of Fame trainer, has not had a winner in his last 109 graded stakes races, but he still has Kentucky Derby hopes.

headline.seo: D. Wayne Lukas’s Losing Streak Hasn’t Kept Him From Racing
headline.main: Long Losing Streak Hasn’t Discouraged Lukas From Racing
